evidence.claim: i3 Commerce uses AWS services including Lambda and S3 for backend processing and storage.
The company implements FHIR for healthcare data exchange as part of its interoperability solutions.
X12 and EDI transaction sets are utilized for processing healthcare claims and transactions effectively.
Integration with various cloud platforms is highlighted in their developer documentation, mentioning Azure Functions.
The engineering page references the use of REST APIs and Webhooks for system integrations.

icp.icp_reason: Focus on healthcare data exchange using APIs and X12 standards aligns with ICP criteria.
